hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: Boutique digital partner, not generic agency

story.title: Why we exist
paragraphs: Most digital agencies sell isolated services—SEO here, web design there, maybe some automation on the side. The result: fragmented systems that don't talk to each other, multiple vendors to manage, and no one thinking about the whole picture.

We started because we kept seeing the same pattern: businesses with decent visibility but websites that don't convert. Websites that convert but no one can find them. Operations drowning in manual work because systems aren't connected.

Our approach is different. We build interconnected infrastructure where visibility feeds your website, your website converts traffic, automation scales operations, and custom engineering fills the gaps. One partner, one system, coherent growth.

items.title: Systems over services
items.description: We don't sell hours or deliverables. We build infrastructure that compounds over time. Every piece we add makes the whole system stronger.

items.title: Transparency over promises
items.description: We don't guarantee rankings or magic results. We set realistic expectations, provide honest assessments, and show you exactly what we're doing and why.

items.title: Measurement over feelings
items.description: Every recommendation is based on data. Every change is tracked. If something isn't working, we adjust. No vanity metrics, no hand-waving.

items.title: Depth over breadth
items.description: We work with fewer clients but go deeper. You get senior expertise on every engagement, not junior execution with occasional oversight.
